title: Am I able to get this guy banned for doing this?
body:
Playing league of legends ranked in general puts you under the control of people who threaten to troll, afk, feed and make you lose. It's a gem of a game if I am able to find a team that won't threaten to AFK or troll in order to get their respective roll that they believe they (Trolls) can do better than you. I feel as if people who do this in champion select that are caught with proof should be banned or given a warning, and if they were to abuse other players inside of champion select again, their account should be banned for a longer period or permanently.

replies.body:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules

If you see someone harrassing others in chat, then you should report them for the behaviour at the post-game lobby screen. You can also submit reports via [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), if for some reason you weren't able to do so from the post-game lobby screen. You can also provide your additional evidence there, but that usually isn't required as Riot can read their own chat logs if they desire.
